name: Zing & Zang
description:
Zing & Zang is a game about light and dark cooperating to reach a goal. Each character emits a specific light at certain times that reveal details about the environment to help the both of them get through.

Enjoy the music over at Zack’s Soundcloud! https://m.soundcloud.com/zack-sheppard/zinzang

Here are the details about the developers:

Zack Sheppard

  1. Programming
  2. Music (https://m.soundcloud.com/zack-sheppard/zinzang)
  3. Sound effects

Alex Bonnet (art at https://www.instagram.com/abon.art)

  1. Art
  2. Character design
  3. SFX

Steve Gutierrez

  1. Game mechanic design
  2. Character design
  3. Level design
  4. SFX

Troy sanders

  1. Programming
